Title: Relates to utilization review determinations
Summary: Provides that certain utilization review determinations shall be made consistent with medical and scientific evidence; includes services for mental health and substance use disorders as part of emergency services.
LawCode: Amd §§3224-b, 4900, 4902 & 4903, Ins L; amd §4902, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the insurance law and the public health law, in relation to utilization review determinations
